moves.name: Sludge
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.effect: Leaves all opposing sync pairs poisoned.

moves.name: Prepare to Fight!
moves.effect: Restores a bit of the user’s HP. Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def.

syncMove.name: Make It Double Sludge
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Last Word
passives.description: The Pokémon uses Explosion immediately before fainting.
